```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE)
influence <- params$influence
```

```{r output}
# influence <- drake::readd(influence_to_model)

influence <- influence %>% 
  select(TS, TF, SB, group, post_n) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.numeric, tidyr::replace_na, 0) %>% 
  mutate(substantive = TF + SB) %>% 
  rename(transactional = TS)

m <- glm(post_n ~
           scale(transactional) + scale(substantive) +
           group,
         data = influence,
         family = 'poisson')

sjPlot::tab_model(m, show.ci = FALSE, show.std = T)
```
